text.string:
You are about to see a white dot trace out a movement on the screen. 
All movements begin and end at the same point.
You will later be asked to repeat this movement yourself on the touchscreen.
This tutorial will show you how to respond.

The red circle indicates that you are now able to respond.
This is not a reaction time test — you do not need to respond right away; take your time!

… and begin to move, the circle will turn green, indicating that the computer is now recording.
Your job is to trace out exactly the movement you observed, even matching the speed.

The trial ends when you return to the starting point. If successful, the green dot will disappear.
If still green, simply drag your finger onto the circle again.
If still red, it didn’t record, so just try again.
